<p><b>Spartan Host</b> - High Performance SSD/NVMe DDoS protected VPSs, Web Hosting and Dedicated Servers</p>

<p>===================================================</p>

<p>60% recurring discount on all Seattle E3 HDD/SSD 512MB+ VPSs! Use coupon <b>bf60-2017</b> at checkout</p>
<p>40% recurring discount on all Seattle E5 NVMe SSD 1GB+ VPSs! Use coupon <b>bf40-2017</b> at checkout</p>
<p>20% recurring discount on all Web Hosting! Use coupon <b>bf20-2017</b> at checkout</p>
<p>20% recurring discount on Dallas X3470, 24gb RAM dedicated server! Use coupon <b>bf20-2017</b> at checkout</p>

Discounts valid until end of **Monday 27th November 2017 GMT**

<p>===================================================</p>

Spartan Host is a dedicated server, VPS and colocation provider with the majority of its hosting operations based in Seattle, Washington and Dallas, Texas. We began hosting Minecraft Servers but have grown exponentially since building up a reputation of being reliable and dedicated to making the customer's experience the best it can be.

**Advantages**

- Top class facilities
- Virtualizor Control Panel (VPS)
- Raid Samsung NVMe SSD | RAID 10 Samsung SSD | Raid 10 Western Digital HDD
- KVM Virtualisation (VPS)
- /64 IPv6 included (VPS)
- Custom ISOs on request (VPS)
- Instant Setup (VPS, Web Hosting)


<br>**Network Test Information**

<br>Location: **Seattle, Washington**
<br>Seattle E3 HDD/SSD VPS's: https://spartanhost.org/vps#standard
<br>Seattle E5 NVMe SSD VPS's: https://spartanhost.org/vps#e5-ssd

<br>Looking Glass: http://lg.sea.spartanhost.net
<br>Data Centre information: https://spartanhost.org/dc-seattle

Peering: Telus and many others via the Seattle Internet Exchange

<br>Location: **Dallas, Texas**
<br>Dallas Storage VPS's: https://spartanhost.org/vps#storage
<br>Dallas Dedicated Servers: http://spartanhost.org/dedicated#dallas
<br>Dallas Web Hosting: http://spartanhost.org/webhosting

<br>Looking Glass: http://lg.dal.spartanhost.net
<br>Data Centre information: https://spartanhost.org/dc-dallas

<br>**DDoS Protection**

<br>Seattle: **20Gb/s TCP** - burst up to 40Gb/s - provided by CNServers
<br>Dallas: **10Gb/s TCP + UDP** (upgradeable to 30, 100 and 250Gb/s on dedicated servers) - provided by Psychz

<p>Both <b>Windows</b> (1gb+ RAM) and <b>Linux</b> can be installed on our KVM plans. All OS options can be seen at checkout, custom ISOs can be uploaded within Virtualizor without the need to contact us. Additional IPv4 addresses are $2 per month.</p>

<p><b>Allowed:</b> Non-spam mail and IRC</p>
<p><b>Not allowed:</b> Spamming, port scanning, non private torrents, traffic exchange and anything illegal in the US.</p>

<p>All VPS and Dedicated Server services are unmanaged.</p>

<p>Terms of service: http://spartanhost.org/tos</p>

BGP sessions available at a small one off setup cost.

<p>If you have any questions or would like a custom quote, don't hesitate to email us at: <a href="mailto:sales@spartanhost.net">sales@spartanhost.net</a>, call us on <b>02895 813535</b> if in the UK or <b>602 9105858</b> if in the US or add us on Skype: <b>spartan_host</b></p>
